title: [PR] fix: remove Whisper hallucination loops and trailing hallucinations from transcription
summary:
## Summary

Whisper models are prone to two classes of hallucinations that corrupt transcription output:

1. **Repetition loops** — Whisper gets stuck repeating a phrase hundreds of times (detectable via `compression_ratio` in `verbose_json` responses)
2. **Trailing hallucinations** — Whisper invent

title: [PR] WIP: Migrating GUI stack / menu management to Redux store
summary: This pull request introduces support for a "dumb UI" mode, where UI updates (such as volume, CPU, RAM, temperature, light, and clock) are handled by a `ViewRenderer` instead of direct state subscriptions. This allows for improved separation between UI rendering and state management, and prepares the

title: suggestion: better integration with Llama-server /Llama swap
summary:
Unfortunately, Ollama is going down the road of the  [Enshittification](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enshittification). They're trying to promote their models in the cloud, overturning the original vision of being a tool that simplifies local model management.
On the contrary, llama.cpp is constant
